title: Pecan AI
description: Founded in 2018, Pecan is a predictive analytics platform that leverages its pioneering Predictive GenAI to remove barriers to AI adoption, making predictive modeling accessible to all data and business teams. Guided by generative AI, companies can obtain precise predictions across various business domains without the need for specialized personnel. Predictive GenAI enables rapid model definition and training, while automated processes accelerate AI implementation.
